TopicTitle: How can I get multiple Kerbals to leave a command module that landed on Minmus?

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I've successfully landed my rocket with attached command module on Minmus. I have one Kerbal on the ground however I don't know how to gain control of the remaining two Kerbals and have them leave the command module. Can someone please provide instructions on how to do this?

Thank you!

Use keys [ and ] to switch between all craft and Kerbals that are near each other (within 2km).

When the craft is selected you can EVA another Kerbal.
